a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita from the World Bank vs. GDP per capita
Both sets of data are adjusted for inflation and price differences across countries and are measured in international-$
Data source: World Bank, Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
